home.title: Who Are We?
home.subtitle: Itskov Stroy is a renovation and remodeling company with a clear focus: fast, easy, and high-quality execution of your construction projects – from small improvements to complete transformations.

paragraph.1: Itskov Stroy Ltd. is a company focused on quality interior renovations, founded with a clear mission - to restore trust in reliable and responsible construction.
paragraph.2: We work with both individuals and businesses alike, offering a full range of services for apartments, houses, and commercial properties.

text.1: In a world where 'renovation' is often associated with delays, compromises, and unnecessary stress – we choose a different path.
text.2: With us, you'll find a team that works with responsibility, dedication, and a personal approach. We don't make promises we can't keep. We value clear communication, honesty, and the highest quality in every service we provide.

1.title: Your Time is Money
1.text: We organize the entire process quickly and without unnecessary hassle.

2.title: Quality Without Compromise
2.text: Durable, high-quality solutions with attention to every detail.

3.title: Integrity Without Exceptions
3.text: We work precisely and keep every promise we make.

4.title: Deadlines and Availability
4.text: Always on time and always available for you.

intro.title: Our Services
intro.text: We offer flexible and high-quality solutions for home and office. From small improvements to complete renovations – we are with you every step of the way.

left.title: Complete and Partial Interior Renovations
left.description: If you need a total renovation – without searching for separate contractors for every task – we are here. And we offer:

tasks: Full renovation from A to Z – planning, execution, finishing details
One organization, one team – saving you time and stress
Regular communication and reliability throughout the process
Completion on time and according to agreed parameters
right.text: You relax – we take care of everything else.

left.title: Electrical Services
left.description: We work according to all safety standards and with the required documentation. We provide:

tasks: Complete wiring for new or renovated properties
Replacement of electrical panels, sockets, switches, and lighting
Installation of concealed wiring with PVC channels or conduits
Diagnostics and troubleshooting
right.text: Safety, functionality, and good aesthetics – that’s our standard.

left.title: Plumbing Services
left.description: Everything is securely installed, pressure-tested, and inspected before completion. We offer:

tasks: Replacement and installation of new plumbing systems
Installation of sinks, boilers, toilets, shower cabins, and more
Work with polypropylene, copper, and PVC pipes
right.text: Plumbing should be done once – but done right.

left.title: Drywall
left.description: Drywall gives freedom for all kinds of interior solutions. With it we:

tasks: Construct suspended ceilings, partition walls, concealed lighting
Create niches, shelves, decorative elements
Straighten uneven walls and ceilings
Install with durable constructions and strong plastering
right.text: A perfect solution for modern interiors, insulation, and soundproofing.

left.title: Tile Installation
left.description: We perfect every detail, because in the bathroom there is no room for mistakes. We guarantee:

tasks: Installation of floor and wall tiles – bathroom, kitchen, hallway, terrace
Precise leveling and consistent grouting
Work with faience, terracotta, granite and mosaic tiles
Proper finishing of corners, trims, and transitions
right.text: Tiles are not just cladding – they create style and comfort.

left.title: Painting
left.description: We work fast and clean, so painting doesn’t turn into a nightmare, but a pleasure. We offer:

tasks: Interior painting with latex, oil-based paint, decorative effects
Consultation on colors and combinations
Surface preparation (priming, plastering if needed)
Clean and precise work – no drips or stains
right.text: With a new color, your home literally comes to life again.

left.title: Plastering
left.description: We use high-quality mixes and professional tools to achieve perfectly smooth walls and ceilings. We provide:

tasks: Cement, gypsum, and fine plaster – depending on the wall type
Leveling and smoothing surfaces
Preparation for painting or wallpapering
Repair of cracks, uneven areas, and other defects
right.text: Beautiful walls start with a solid base.

left.title: Floor Screed
left.description: We use high-quality materials that guarantee durability and long life of the floor covering. We provide:

tasks: Machine and manual screed – depending on the room type and requirements
Precise floor leveling
Fast drying and the ability to step on it in a short time
Proper preparation for all types of flooring – tiles, parquet, laminate, vinyl
right.text: A strong and level floor base is the start of every good renovation.

project.title: Renovation and Repainting of Ceilings and Columns in Shopping Mall
project.description: We carried out a complete refresh of the interior spaces in a large shopping mall, focusing primarily on the ceilings and columns. The work included surface preparation through sanding and plastering, removal of old coatings, and application of high-quality, long-lasting paints. For the columns, we used wear-resistant coatings to ensure durability and easy maintenance, while the ceilings were painted with white dispersion paint to create a brighter and more spacious look. The project was completed within a short timeframe and with minimal disruption to the operation of the retail stores. The final result is a modern, clean, and fresh appearance that enhances the overall experience of visitors.
